traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. he never insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him. he also never judges people by their appearance. his agreeableness also makes him more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people regardless of gender.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy is uninterested in romantic entanglements.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will learn new skills slightly faster than other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description: Timmy strives for perfection in his work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and he will try to hide or run as a first priority.
traits.name: coward

traits.description: Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description: Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description: A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
traits.name: neat

traits.description: Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. he will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description: Timmy has never felt nausea in his life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to him.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. he will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description: Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description: Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
traits.name: rebel

traits.description: Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
traits.name: submissive

traits.description: Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description: Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description: Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description: Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description: Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
traits.name: snob

traits.description: Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for him.
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description: Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
traits.name: anxious

traits.description: No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. he will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description: Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.
traits.name: prude

traits.description: An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
traits.name: catperson

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description: Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description: Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description: The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description: The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier just being near a large mountain.
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description: Timmy has a twisted secret. he treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description: Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description: Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: stoner

traits.description: Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: lush

traits.description: Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description: Timmy is never really asleep or awake. he is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. his bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description: Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description: Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description: Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
traits.name: academian

traits.description: Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description: In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description: Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description: Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and he will likely convince you if given the chance.
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description: Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description: NAME is an robot. As a robot HE is a bit faster and not really sensible for psychic phenomena.
traits.name: robot

traits.description: Timmy is not affected by the effects of aging.
traits.name: rasvacoule

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around fighting. he doesn't have the intelligence to do much else.
traits.name: reptilianbrain

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of the opposite gender.
traits.name: straight

traits.description: Timmy will never cheat on a partner, no matter how bad the relationship gets.
traits.name: faithful

traits.description: Timmy just cannot be trusted to stay faithful to a partner.
traits.name: philanderer

traits.description: Timmy prefers romantic relationships involving multiple partners to monogamous relationships. he doesn't mind if his partners romance other people, but will be less happy in a restraining, monogamous relationship.
traits.name: polyamorous

traits.description: Timmy detests manual labor, feeling that tasks such as cleaning and hauling are beneath him. he will perform such tasks more slowly than others would, and will also carry less per load when required to haul.
traits.name: hatesdumblabor

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. he will prefer fishing above other activities.
traits.name: fisherman

traits.description: Timmy has the traits of a dragon so they are considered very good to look at, intellegent, but are still beasts at their core giving them an edge in survival, but also makes them territorial and less tolerant of others.
traits.name: dragonattribute

traits.description: Timmy has the characteristics of an elder dragon so they are considered extremely good to look at, of superior intellegent, but are still beasts at their core giving them an edge in survival, but also makes them territorial and less tolerant of others.
traits.name: elderdragoncharacteristic

traits.description: Timmy has the aspect of an ancient dragon so they are considered bewitching to look at, of vast intellegence, but are still beasts at their core giving them an edge in survival, but also makes them territorial and extremely less tolerant of others.
traits.name: ancientdragonaspect

traits.description: Timmy has the manifestation of an ancient elder dragon so they are considered beyond bewitching to look at, of unending intellegence, but are no mere beasts, they are almost beyond mortal limits almost guaranteeing survival, these beings will be territorial and will not tolerate others whom they are frustrated with.
traits.name: ancientelderdragonmanifestation

traits.description: Either the body or mind of Timmy is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.

data.mod: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

traits.name: elder

traits.description: Everything Timmy cooks turns into Dark matter.
traits.name: incompetentcook

traits.description: Timmy has a strong back which allows him to carry more than most people.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back, he must be part mule or something because he can carry a lot more than most people.
traits.name: verystrongback

traits.description: Timmy has a charismatic personality. he is good at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: charismatic

traits.description: Timmy has a very charismatic personality. he is great at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: verycharismatic

traits.description: Timmy has an intimidating personality, this gives him an advantage in social interactions.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: intimidating

traits.description: Timmy has a very intimidating personality, this gives him a large advantage in social interactions.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryintimidating

traits.description: Timmy has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss his target more often in combat.
traits.name: pooraim

traits.description: Timmy has good hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.
traits.name: steadyaim

traits.description: Timmy has great hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.
traits.name: greataim

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter with artistic finesse, he enjoys putting things together and he's pretty good at it.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: Timmy has an iron stomach. he can go without eating longer and it takes more to upset his stomach.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: ironstomach2

traits.description: Timmy packs lightly. he will carry less but will move more swiftly.
traits.name: packin'light

traits.description: Timmy is a pack rat, he will keep just about anything that might be useful later.
traits.name: packrat

traits.description: Timmy has good reflexes and moves with finesse. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: agile

traits.description: Timmy has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: ninja

traits.description: Timmy is more intelligent than average. he learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around him.
traits.name: intelligent

traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent. he learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around him.
traits.name: veryintelligent

traits.description: Timmy is aware of his surroundings and has a good understanding of how his actions affects others.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: Timmy is very aware of his surroundings and has a great understanding of how his actions affects others.
traits.name: veryperceptive

traits.description: Timmy is good at doging things. he is good at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: dodgy

traits.description: Timmy is great at evading things. he is great at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: evasive

traits.description: Timmy is great at traveling. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: traveler

traits.description: Timmy is great at exploration. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: explorer

traits.description: Timmy is great at adventuring. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: adventurer2

traits.description: Timmy is a bandolier. he likes to keep extra ammo handy for reloading ranged weapons.
traits.name: bandolier

traits.description: Timmy has a scientific mind. he is a good researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: scientific

traits.description: Timmy has a very scientific mind. he is a great researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: veryscientific

traits.description: Timmy has good health and an enduring personality. he is better at handling stressful situations than others.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: enduring

traits.description: Timmy has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. he is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryenduring

traits.description: Timmy is great at bargaining. he is great at social interactions and can find great deals while trading.
traits.name: bargainer

traits.description: Timmy is a hard bargainer. he is adept at social interactions and can find the best deals while trading.
traits.name: hardbargainer

traits.description: Timmy has an uninspiring personality. he has less motivation to learn and puts less effort into social interactions.
stats: -10% per day slave suppression fall rate
-10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: uninspiring

traits.description: Timmy has an inspirational personality. he is good at social interactions and is a motivated learner .
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: inspirational

traits.description: Timmy has a very inspirational personality. he is great at social interactions and is a very motivated learner.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryinspirational

traits.description: Timmy is a generous person, sometimes to a fault. he is a good negotiator but often does so by offering more than he should.
traits.name: generous

traits.description: Timmy is an overly generous person to a fault. he is a great negotiator but often does so by offering more than he should
traits.name: overlygenerous

traits.description: Timmy is good at working with scrap metal. he is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
traits.name: scrapper

traits.description: Timmy is a natural leader, he is good at social interactions and can handle stressful situations that others might not.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: naturalleader

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radresistant

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a tolerance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radtolerant

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actionboy

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actiongirl

traits.description: Timmy has quick hands. When it comes to his hands, Timmy never hesitates.
traits.name: quickhands

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, he loves guns so much that he gets a mood boost while holding a ranged weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly, but if you think that's fast wait until you see he eat!
traits.name: scrounger

traits.description: Timmy has a sturdy frame. he can carry more and it takes more to bring him down.
traits.name: sturdyframe

traits.description: Timmy is survialist. he has a natural ability to survive some situations that others might not.
traits.name: survivalist

traits.description: Timmy finds the gap to make the tackle! he moves quickly and gets the jobs done before anyone can react.
traits.name: blitz

traits.description: Timmy is a philanthropist. he is generally good natured and cares for the welfare of others.
traits.name: philanthropist

traits.description: Timmy has healing hands. Whether it's for patching up or food the colony knows they can count on his healing touch.
traits.name: healinghands

traits.description: Timmy is part tree! It takes more to bring Timmy down but also more to get him moving.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: rooted

traits.description: Timmy has a lead belly. his belly can go much longer without food and he is more resistant to toxic radiation.
traits.name: leadbelly

traits.description: Timmy has bear arms. he can carry more and his arms pack more of a punch!
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: beararms

traits.description: Timmy is serendipitous, he seems to be a pretty lucky individual and he's pretty happy about it too.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: serendipitous

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening. he is quick when working with plants and recieves more bountiful yields when harvesting them.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a tenderizer! he has a passion for beating meat into submission.
traits.name: tenderizer

traits.description: Timmy seems to discover hidden wealth where ever he goes.
traits.name: fortunefinder

traits.description: Timmy is a bountiful butcher! he isn't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what he wants.
traits.name: bountifulbutcher

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for animals. he is adept at animal interactions and will bond with them more often. Timmy refuses to hunt animals.
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: Timmy has a magnetic body, literally! Somehow he able to use his attractiveness on not just colonists, but metals too!.
traits.name: magnetic

traits.description: Timmy embodies wellness! Colonist who need treatment can rest easily knowing they have his's expertise keeping them alive.
traits.name: lifegiver

traits.description: Timmy is a spiritual healer, he is a great doctor with good social skills. Timmy loves to grow and make his own medicine.
traits.name: spiritualhealer

traits.description: Timmy has a frail back and won't be able to carry as much as the average person.
traits.name: frailback

traits.description: Timmy is still human, mostly. he is immune to the effects of toxic fallout and much harder to kill but his ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
traits.name: ghoulish

traits.description: Timmy isn't stupid! he is just... different. he works through tasks slowly but learns extremely quickly. he is incapable performing intellectual, social or caring tasks.
traits.name: idiotsavant

traits.description: Timmy isn't very smart. he can mess up doing just about anything.
traits.name: stupid

traits.description: Timmy isn't very aware of his surroundings, or anything at all really. he
traits.name: oblivious

traits.description: Timmy is part woodchuck! he wants everyone to think his great woodworking skills are because of talent but everybody knows it's really because of those dang teeth.
traits.name: woodchucker

traits.description: Timmy is a wrecking ball! he can push through building material like it's not even there. he really doesn't know his own strength, often breaking things during construction.
traits.name: wreckingball

traits.description: Timmy is a perfectionist with a passion for art. he is great at construction but takes longer to complete tasks because he puts too much effort into making everything perfect.
traits.name: perfectionist2

traits.description: Timmy has an iron fist! he can punch through foes like they are not even there. Timmy has a passion for melee combat and dislikes ranged weapons.
traits.name: ironfist

traits.description: Formerly a prison guard at a maximum security prison, Timmy knows how to intimidate the most disobedient of prisoners.
traits.name: prisonguard

traits.description: Timmy has an unshakeable belief in their ideology, he is skilled at getting others to see things the same way.
traits.name: priest2

traits.description: With little training, Timmy recovers neural heat multitudes faster than even lifelong psylinks, albeit with reduced heat capacity.
traits.name: psychicprodigy

traits.description: Timmy was born with immense neural heat capacity and proportionately slow heat dissipation.
traits.name: giftedpsychic

traits.description: Timmy has nimble hands and works at a rapid pace.
traits.name: fasthands

traits.description: Timmy has exceptional hand-eye coordination and can quickly put his sights on a target.
traits.name: crackshot

traits.description: Timmy is a talented marksman with a deadly aim.
traits.name: marksman

traits.description: Timmy is a natural born warrior and loves the thrill of fighting at close range.
traits.name: swordsman

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled builder, turning the most complicated plans into reality.
traits.name: foreman

traits.description: Timmy has an extensive knowledge of geology and uses that to his advantage.
traits.name: deepdriller

traits.description: Timmy handles ingredients with great care and prepares the most delicious meals.
traits.name: sous-chef

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled chemist and proficient in synthesizing drugs.
traits.name: pharmacist

traits.description: Timmy is a professional botanist and knows the peculiarities of most plants.
traits.name: botanist

traits.description: Timmy is a passionate farmer, loving the smell of fresh hay and the sight of grazing animals.
traits.name: rancher

traits.description: Timmy can move his hands with fine-grained precision.
traits.name: artisan2

traits.description: Timmy sacrifices treatment quality to save as many lives as possible.
traits.name: fieldmedic

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled craftsman and knows how to handle various materials.
traits.name: smith

traits.description: Timmy is tactful in his social interactions and uses it to his advantage.
traits.name: socialworker

traits.description: Timmy has an extraordinary intellect accompanied with mental instability.
traits.name: naturalgenius

traits.description: Timmy maintains a clear state of mind and remains unfazed by the struggles of life.
traits.name: wise

traits.description: Timmy rarely stands out and is overlooked by almost everyone he meets.
traits.name: peasant

traits.description: Timmy is a messy person. he tends to leave dirt and trash where ever he goes and is slow to clean up after himself.
traits.name: slovenly

traits.description: Timmy likes clean environments. he cleans quickly and avoids leaving dirt and trash.
traits.name: fastidious

traits.description: Timmy has spent time learning and practicing the tribal rituals required to link oneself to an Anima tree. he has long since been enamoured by the wonders of nature.
traits.name: attuned

traits.description: Timmy is now a natural hunter.
traits.name: naturalhunter

traits.description: Timmy is intrigued by the idea of becoming something other than human.
traits.name: mutationaffinity

traits.description: Timmy is a security variant, it features higher armour compared to other variants.
traits.name: securitymodel

traits.description: Timmy is a forest variant, it features higher melee skills and higher movement in forests compared to other variants.
traits.name: forestmodel

traits.description: Timmy is a winter variant, it features higher accuracy and higher movement in snowy terrain compared to other variants.
traits.name: wintermodel

traits.description: Timmy is a desert variant, it features faster aiming time and higher movement in sandy terrain compared to other variants.
traits.name: desertmodel

traits.description: Timmy Todo. he Todo
traits.name: robot

traits.description: Timmy Todo. he Todo
traits.name: valuable

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description: A baseline kilhn. These people are proud decendants of an ancient dragoniod race, though their true origins remain a mystery. They are capable hunters boasting increased survivability in almost any climate as they have strong defences and natural weapons. The average Kilhn can live easily to 1500 years old. They dislike the cold and survive on solely a meat diet. They are naturally greedy and fairly lazy, as such they work slower, gather less, make for poor farmers, and generally dislike manual labor unless it's related to hunting.
races.name: kilhn

races.description: The legacy of a fallen empire, with a distant link to the humanoid races of earth and beyond. Other than the fact that they began to awaken over the past century, no one knows much else about what they are, where they are from or fundamentals behind their technology, which seems to bridge the gap between science and magic.
races.name: forsaken

races.description:
A tribe of rabbit-like humanoids. They are small and weak, but have powerful legs.
        
        Small bodies leave them roughly 15% weaker in nearly all respects
        Less resistant to cold temperatures
        Over 40% faster running speed
        Generally fine-featured and attractive
        Somewhat Neurotic
races.name: Bun

races.description: the Marvelous gift of glitterworld bionics. Humanoid with cat ears and tail.
races.name: Nyaron

races.description: An Angel. These people are humans that got resurrected as angels by a special power that works in mysterious ways. These people are kind and full of love.
races.name: Angel

races.description: A Devil. These people are humans that got resurrected as devils by a special power that works in mysterious ways. These people are psychopaths and full of malice.
races.name: Devil

races.description: A bloodthirsty vulpine near-human.
races.name: Revia

races.description:
A humanoid race living in cities under the sea. Having traits similar to sea creatures, their blood contains substances that can be used for various medical uses.

Descendants of glitterworld explorers who settled in the deep sea, generations of body modifications has led to their current form. Spreading far and wide into the rim, they built many cities and prospered. Until now.
races.name: Moyo

races.description: Xenoorca is an artificial race created by a faction of a spacer group, genetically engineered so that only women are born so as not to form a country or a large faction. Based on the concept of "biological weapons for combat", it has become a race with high energy due to the lower body and special muscles similar to marine mammals by incorporating the genes of marine organisms, the skin is stronger than humans. It is strong against low temperatures, but weak against high temperatures, and because it maintains high physical ability, it consumes energy quickly and tends to become hungry. \ n \ n It has a "cunning and ruthless" personality because it is only for combat, and there is no mercy on the adversaries. they are enjoying the slaughter. Some weirdos can be mixed in with colonies of other races, and people will get to know the "mischievous and cheerful" side of Xenoorca. \ n \ n Similarly, the artificial race Near Mere is a fellow of the same country born in the same plant.
races.name: Xenoorca

races.description:
Nearmare are an artificial race. They are genetically engineered to always be female in order to keep their population under control. They were originally intended to be utilized as weapons using their mental interference abilities, but their low physical endurance made them unsuitable for the task. After escaping, some assimilated into other cultures, while others banded together and founded small villages in secret.
Nearmore can use special weapons to focus their psychic attacks. They can also summon ghostly retainers. However, they are physically weak, so they perform best alongside other races.
races.name: Nearmare

races.description:
A subspecies of Nearmare who, through faith, have altered their very nature. They are more susceptable to mental attacks, but their physical resilience has been honed by their long training.
 Their summoned creatures are empowered by their faith, granting them increased endurance.
races.name: nearmaredevotee

races.description: Kijins are ogres who were evolved alikes of humans. Their huge bodies and muscles have shrunk, but the muscles are more dense and stronger. They still have to eat a lot to keep themselves up.
races.name: Kijin

races.description:
Arachne race lineage can be traced back to Arachne homeworld where the temperature fluctuate between cold and warm.
Arachnes over thousands of generations began to adapt to these temperature and ables themselves to withstand cold but in return have less tolerance to the heat
races.name: arachne

races.description:
A beautiful xenohuman with characteristics reminiscent of dragons, this particular strain seems to have evolved recently either due to poaching from human slavetraders or some
			other interference. Originally created as a powerful farm animal or perhaps targets for body confiscation by transhumanists, these long-lived people are beginning to use every scrap of technology they can and albeit slowly, forming large and complex social groups. They are naturally in a good mood, but this has been shown to quickly deteriorate if attacked, and despite their small stature their bones and muscles are much denser compared to genome typical humans. While they could hardly be considered greedy, they have been seen showing a fondness for rare metals and gems.
races.name: Dragonian

races.description: A mutant of the catgirl species that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
races.name: Catgirl

races.description: A mutant of the wolfgirl species that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
races.name: Wolfgirl

races.description: A mutant of the foxgirl species that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
races.name: Foxgirl

races.description: A Cowgirl that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
races.name: Cowgirl

races.description: A Harpy that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
races.name: Harpy

races.description: A mutant accumulation of slimy liquid that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
races.name: Slime

races.description: A Baphomet that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
races.name: Baphomet

races.description: A Centaur that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
races.name: Centaur

races.description: A mutant of the Forest Fairy species that has developed a semblance of intelligence./n A fragile existence that withers in a toxic environment.
races.name: ForestFairy

races.description: A mutant of the Ice Fairy species that has developed a semblance of intelligence./n A fragile existence that cannot survive warm temperatures.
races.name: IceFairy

races.description: A mutant of the Dragon species that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
races.name: Dragon

races.description: A mutant of the Thrumbogirl species that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
races.name: Thrumbogirl

races.description: A subspecies of the Moyo race, usually babies born after a Moyo is fertilized by a creature infected with the deep-sea virus. And because the symbiotic virus affects, most of them have strange personalities, but not intrinsically bad.
races.name: Red Moyo

races.description:
The violent and hostile Mantis appear, to Humans anyway, to resemble man-sized Praying Mantises, although they are much more aggressive than their namesakes. Whereas praying mantises kill prey merely to survive, the much larger and more intelligent Mantis race kill remorselessly to suit their own personal agendas- usually without survival as a concern, making for a pitiless and brutal insectoid warrior species.

While humans and most other species have manufactured handheld weaponry to utilize in combat, the Mantis usually default to their agility, and sharpened exoskeletal appendages to tear through their enemies, and their skill as warriors goes almost unchallenged in 1v1 combat even against the rock species. The Mantis also possess extremely acidic saliva which can burn through flesh and melt most metal alloys.

While Mantis excel at combat, especially personal combat, they are the least adept of all the races at technical repairs. They have overcome this problem by frequently taking Engi slaves. Engi slaves can be found on a majority of their bases and ships. Though some individual Mantises have been known to work with the Galactic Federation, the race as a whole tends to be deceptive, opportunistic and untrustworthy, and can commonly be found piloting their signature style of well armed spacecraft, hunting down weaker enemies in pursuit of their belongings. Human children are told tales of their red ships, and of the Mantis invasion of Earth.

- 115% Speed
- 130% Melee hit chance / 125% Shooting hit chance
- 120% sharp damage / 105% Melee evasion
- 75% Construction / 75% Drug production
- 85% Mining / 90% Smelting Smithing Tailoring
- Claws
races.name: Mantis

races.description: A race of sentient humanoid insects. Although primitive, a surprising number of colonies have been found on planets across the Rim. This has lead researchers to believe the species was intentionally seeded by an unknown power, though some fringe groups claim to have found evidence that the Skrix were once a spacefaring race themselves.
races.name: skrixworker

races.description: A race of sentient humanoid insects. Although primitive, a surprising number of colonies have been found on planets across the Rim. This has lead researchers to believe the species was intentionally seeded by an unknown power, though some fringe groups claim to have found evidence that the Skrix were once a spacefaring race themselves.
races.name: skrixnoble

races.description: A race of sentient humanoid insects. Although primitive, a surprising number of colonies have been found on planets across the Rim. This has lead researchers to believe the species was intentionally seeded by an unknown power, though some fringe groups claim to have found evidence that the Skrix were once a spacefaring race themselves.
races.name: skrixsoldier

races.description: A race of sentient humanoid insects. Although primitive, a surprising number of colonies have been found on planets across the Rim. This has lead researchers to believe the species was intentionally seeded by an unknown power, though some fringe groups claim to have found evidence that the Skrix were once a spacefaring race themselves.
races.name: skrixroyal

races.description: Standard Security variant of the Defender, mostly commonly found on starships to urban military installations. It features higher armour.
races.name: Peacekeeper Defender

races.description: Forest variant of the Defender. It features higher melee skills and agility and has a movement bonus on forest terrain.
races.name: Peacekeeper Defender Forest

races.description: Desert variant of the Defender. It features higher rate of fire and has a movement bonus on desert terrain.
races.name: Peacekeeper Defender Desert

races.description: Winter variant of the Defender. It features higher accuracy and has a movement bonus on snowy terrain.
races.name: Peacekeeper Defender Winter

races.description: Standard Security variant of the Enforcer, a common sight on war torn planets and are fielded by massive private and planetary armies. It features higher armour.
races.name: Peacekeeper Enforcer

races.description: Forest variant of the Enforcer. It features higher melee skills and agility and has a movement bonus on forest terrain.
races.name: Peacekeeper Enforcer Forest

races.description: Desert variant of the Enforcer. It features higher rate of fire and has a movement bonus on desert terrain.
races.name: Peacekeeper Enforcer Desert

races.description: Winter variant of the Enforcer. It features higher accuracy and has a movement bonus on snowy terrain.
races.name: Peacekeeper Enforcer Winter

races.description: Standard Security variant of the Sentinel, they are often found in few numbers supporting the vast armies of Defenders and Enforcers in an ongoing conflict. It features higher armour.
races.name: Peacekeeper Sentinel

races.description: Forest variant of the Sentinel. It features higher melee skills and agility and has a movement bonus on forest terrain.
races.name: Peacekeeper Sentinel Forest

races.description: Desert variant of the Sentinel. It features higher rate of fire and has a movement bonus on desert terrain.
races.name: Peacekeeper Sentinel Desert

races.description: Winter variant of the Sentinel. It features higher accuracy and has a movement bonus on snowy terrain.
races.name: Peacekeeper Sentinel Winter
